summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program year January 1, 1981 through December 31, 1981; accepting financial assistance from the United States Department of Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund; authorizing implementation of a Bonus Block Grant Program by the Department of Community Development; and authorizing the Director of the Department of Community Development to enter into such agreements as may be necessary for the effectuation of said program.
